metadata.name: Colored Runes
metadata.description:
Makes vanilla rune sprites colored.

[tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/0DUy8da.png[/img][/td] [td]Blank[/td] [td](Vanilla) Random rune effect[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/gCPbU8W.png[/img][/td] [td]Black[/td] [td](Vanilla) 40 room dmg, turns pickups into spiders, turns pedestals into stats[/td] [/tr] [/table]
Black Rune stays black, Blank Rune stays purple.
Only affects runes on the ground, not held runes. If you know how to fix this without re-drawing the whole pocket item GUI, let me know (I've already done the HUD sprites, but the spritesheet can't just be swapped out because vanilla runes don't have separate sprites).
Obviously this is a bit of a cheat in shops but I mainly made this as a QoL thing.
Inspired by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2658081136]Visible Cards on the Floor[/url], and borrows some code from that mod.
